item.title: rustdesk/rustdesk
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: foss42/apidash
item.description: API Dash is a beautiful AI-powered open-source cross-platform (Desktop & Mobile) API Client built using Flutter which can help you easily create & customize your HTTP & GraphQL API requests, visually inspect responses and generate API integration code. A lightweight alternative to postman/insomnia.

item.title: authpass/authpass
item.description: AuthPass - Password Manager based on Flutter for all platforms. Keepass 2.x (KDBX 3 and KDBX 4) compatible.

item.title: AppFlowy-IO/appflowy-editor
item.description: A highly customizable rich-text editor for Flutter. The AppFlowy Editor project for AppFlowy and beyond.

item.title: leanflutter/awesome-flutter-desktop
item.description: A curated list of awesome things related to Flutter desktop.

item.title: Enough-Software/enough_mail_app
item.description: Mail app for iOS, Android and hopefully more platforms in the future. Based on Flutter.
